<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns an array of all entities that are attached to the transport with [[ropes]]. This command is the opposite of [[ropeAttachedTo]].<br><br>
[[Image:ropeAttachedObjects.jpg|400px]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeAttachedObjects]] ropesOwner

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ropesOwner: [[Object]] - transport from which a single or multiple ropes are originating

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of attached entities on ropes
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_cargoArray = [[ropeAttachedObjects]] heli1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>
